Package weka.filters.unsupervised.attribute

Class LabelWordVectors

  • java.lang.Object
    • weka.filters.Filter
      • weka.filters.SimpleFilter
        • weka.filters.SimpleBatchFilter
          • weka.filters.unsupervised.attribute.LabelWordVectors
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, CapabilitiesHandler, CapabilitiesIgnorer, CommandlineRunnable, OptionHandler, RevisionHandler
    public class LabelWordVectors
extends SimpleBatchFilter
    A filter for labeling word vectors using a list of affective lexicons in arff format.
    Version:
    $Revision: 1 $
    Author:
    Felipe Bravo-Marquez (fbravoma@waikato.ac.nz)
    See Also:
